content: the blessed bluebird sweater scarf is a cozy textured crochet sweater scarf pattern designed to showcase the beauty of hand-dyed yarn created in collaboration with canadian yarn dyer arcane fibre works this design features their stunning blessed bluebird colourway in merino nylon dk weight yarn using a thoughtful blend of moss stitch spike stitches and the birdsfoot stitch this pattern creates a richly textured fabric with beautiful drape and visual interest the long wrap-around style makes it easy to wear as a scarf or style like a lightweight sweater for extra warmth this crochet sweater scarf pattern is perfect for crocheters who love relaxing stitches elegant texture and timeless accessories that feel just as good to make as they do to wear finished sizes instructions given to fit size x-small changes for small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large and 5x-large are in xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl to fit bust circumference 28 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 sleeve length 14 ½ main body length 51 54 ½ 61 ½ 65 72 75 ½ 82 ½ 86 93 total length 80 83 ½ 90 ½ 94 101 104 ½ 111 ½ 115 122 width 14 ½ 14 ½ 14 ½ 16 ½ 16 ½ 16 ½ 18 ¼ 18 ¼ 18 ¼ materials i used arcane fibre works dk 80/20 it is a 80% superwash merino 20% nylon dk weight yarn any yarn of similar weight would work approximately 900 1000 1100 1200 1300 1400 1500 1600 1700 yds 5mm hook stitch markers yarn needle scissors measuring tape difficulty intermediate this pattern has been tested by a number of experienced crocheters and i have provided many pictures within the pattern to help you along the way if you run into trouble you are free to message me for help
